item.title: ChatGPT for macOS now compatible with Apple Notes and other apps - India Today
item.description:
ChatGPT for macOS now compatible with Apple Notes and other apps

Published On: Dec 21, 2024

Published By: Aman Rashid

OpenAI has introduced a new update for the ChatGPT app on macOS, enhancing its functionality by allowing integration with popular note-taking and coding applications.

  • ChatGPT can now interact with apps like Apple Notes, VSCode, and more, offering real-time assistance to users.
  • This feature is currently available only for paid subscribers but will roll out to free users next year.
  • The integration allows users to activate ChatGPT in any supported app using the shortcut Option + Space.
  • Privacy controls are in place, ensuring users manage when and how ChatGPT interacts with their apps.
“ChatGPT can now work with approximately 30 macOS apps,” said Kevin Weil, Chief Product Officer at OpenAI.

This update enriches user productivity by allowing seamless access to ChatGPT's capabilities directly within applications.

item.title: Samsung S95F OLED TV: what we want to see - TechRadar
item.description:
Samsung S95F OLED TV: What to Expect from the Next Generation

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: TechRadar

Samsung's S95 series OLED TVs, known for their exceptional picture quality and advanced QD-OLED technology, are set to continue evolving with the upcoming S95F model slated for release in 2025. While the current S95D has already earned accolades as one of the best TVs of 2024, the next iteration promises enhancements in AI-driven picture processing, smarter interfaces, and potentially new screen sizes.

  • The S95F will introduce advanced AI capabilities for picture and sound optimization.
  • It aims to improve peak brightness and reflection management.
  • Gamers can expect AI game optimization and higher refresh rates for a smoother experience.
  • Sustainability will be a focus, with the use of eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient design.
“If Samsung can combine these refinements with stunning picture quality, the S95F OLED could become a flagship TV that truly delivers on all fronts.”

The Samsung S95F OLED TV is positioned to redefine the flagship TV standard, ensuring it meets the growing demands of cinephiles and gamers alike.

item.title: Review: The Bose Smart Soundbar has a boring name and great sound - Mashable
item.description:
Bose Smart Soundbar Review: Great Sound, Boring Name

Publication Date: September 2024 Source: Mashable

The Bose Smart Soundbar has become a popular choice among mid-range soundbars, priced typically at $399, with a focus on delivering great sound quality for TV shows, movies, and music.

  • The soundbar provides a clear and balanced audio experience.
  • Features like AI Dialogue Assist enhance dialogue clarity.
  • Competes effectively with higher-end products while remaining budget-friendly.
  • Setup is quick and user-friendly, although there are some connectivity issues noted.
"For most users, this soundbar hits the sweet spot in terms of features, sound, and value for the dollar."

In conclusion, while the Bose Smart Soundbar may lack creativity in its name and design, it excels in sound quality and functionality, making it a worthwhile investment for audio enthusiasts.

item.title: OnePlus 13R Chipset Details Confirmed Ahead Of India Launch On January 7; Check Expected Specs, Price - Zee News
item.description:
OnePlus 13R Chipset Details Confirmed Ahead Of India Launch On January 7

Date: January 7, 2023 Source: Zee News

The Chinese electronics company OnePlus is set to launch its OnePlus 13R smartphone in India during the OnePlus Winter Launch Event on January 7, along with the OnePlus Buds Pro 3. The company has confirmed that the device will be powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.

Expected Price In India

The OnePlus 13R is anticipated to be priced around Rs 45,000, comparable to competitors like the Vivo V30 Pro and Realme GT 6.

Expected Specifications

  • 6.82-inch Quad-HD+ LTPO AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate
  • Peak brightness of 4,500 nits
  • Dolby Vision support
  • 6,000mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging
  • Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC with up to 24GB LPDDR5X RAM and 1TB UFS 4.0 storage
  • Triple camera setup: 50MP main, 50MP ultrawide, 50MP telephoto with 3x optical zoom
  • 32MP front camera for selfies

Both the OnePlus 13R and its predecessor are expected to run ColorOS 15 based on Android 15.

item.title: Vivo X200 Pro vs Vivo X100 Pro: Here’s what’s new in the new generation smartphone - HT Tech
item.description:
Vivo X200 Pro vs Vivo X100 Pro:

Date: [Publication Date] Source: [Source]

The Vivo X200 Pro has launched in India, bringing significant upgrades over the X100 Pro, especially in camera and performance.

Key Points:

  • Both models feature an elegant design, but the X200 Pro includes refinements such as flat screen and improved durability with IP69 rating.
  • The X200 Pro's display has quad-curved features and offers enhanced fingerprint scanning technology.
  • X200 Pro's camera setup includes a robust 50MP primary, 50MP ultrawide, and 200MP telephoto lens, providing superior performance over the X100 Pro's 50MP setup.
  • Powered by the new MediaTek Dimensity 9400, the X200 Pro significantly outperforms the X100 Pro’s Dimensity 9300 chipset.
  • The pricing starts at ₹94,999 for the X200 Pro compared to ₹96,999 for the X100 Pro.
“The new ZEISS APO certification enhances the camera performance of the Vivo X200 Pro, making it a worthy upgrade.”

In summary, the Vivo X200 Pro offers meaningful enhancements that may justify the upgrade for consumers seeking the latest technology.

item.title: Reliance Jio Unveils JioTag Go - APAC News Network
item.description:
Reliance Jio Unveils JioTag Go

Date: Mumbai

Source: Apac News Network

Reliance Jio has launched the JioTag Go, an affordable tracking device designed specifically for Android users in India. This compact device integrates with Google’s Find My Device network, allowing users to track personal belongings such as keys, wallets, and bags.

The JioTag Go connects to the Find My Device app, offering real-time location tracking and alerts if items move out of range. Weighing approximately 9 grams, the device features a replaceable battery with a lifespan of up to one year and emits a sound of up to 120 decibels to locate items easily.

  • Integrates with Google’s Find My Device.
  • Real-time location tracking.
  • Replaceable battery lasting up to one year.
  • Built-in speaker with 120 dB sound.
  • Available through multiple retail channels.
“This release addresses the rising need for personal tracking devices, offering a practical solution for both everyday and professional use.”

The launch of the JioTag Go signifies Jio’s expansion into connected device solutions, aiming to enhance its market position with user-centric products.

item.title: Microsoft Copilot Vision is the perfect holiday shopping buddy, and it’s finally here - TechRadar
item.description:
Microsoft Copilot Vision is the perfect holiday shopping buddy, and it’s finally here

Date: December 19, 2024 Source: TechRadar

Microsoft has unveiled the Vision feature for Copilot Pro subscribers, enabling the AI to assist users by analyzing their screens in real time, especially during holiday shopping.

  • Microsoft is rolling out the Vision feature for Copilot Plus subscribers.
  • Vision lets the AI see what's on the screen for Edge browser users.
  • The AI offers contextual advice for shopping, planning trips, and other activities.
“Something special is coming this holiday break 🎁 As of today, Vision is rolling out to our U.S. Copilot Pro subscribers on Windows…” - Mustafa Suleyman, Microsoft AI CEO

With Vision, users can get personalized shopping suggestions and assistance based on what they are viewing online.

item.title: Breaking taboo: Carefree young consumers show soaring interest in sexual wellness products | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Breaking taboo: Carefree young consumers show soaring interest in sexual wellness products

Publication Date: [Not provided]

Source: Mint

With products ranging from body massagers to performance supplements, sexual wellness startups such as Bold Care and MyMuse are attracting rising interest from carefree young consumers in India.

  • Startups report a significant increase in repeat purchases.
  • Bold Care is co-owned by actor Ranveer Singh and has noted a majority of customers making frequent repurchases.
  • There is a shift in societal attitudes towards sexual wellness, moving from taboo to acceptance.
“A majority of customers are making frequent repurchases, a first for the company since its inception in 2020.” - Rajat Jadhav, co-founder of Bold Care

This growing interest from young consumers indicates a broader cultural shift towards openness and acceptance regarding sexual wellness in India.

item.title: OpenAI Upgrades Its Smartest AI Model With Improved Reasoning Skills - WIRED
item.description:
OpenAI Upgrades Its Smartest AI Model With Improved Reasoning Skills

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: Wired

OpenAI has announced an upgraded version of its AI model, named o3, which enhances its reasoning capabilities and competes directly with Google's latest model. This upgrade aims to improve performance in complex tasks that require deep logical reasoning.

Key Points:

  • The new model, o3, replaces the previous version, o1, and is designed for improved logical reasoning.
  • OpenAI CEO Sam Altman emphasizes this as the beginning of a new phase in AI capabilities.
  • o3 performs significantly better than o1, particularly in advanced mathematical reasoning and coding tasks.
  • Google has also introduced its reasoning model, Gemini 2.0, intensifying competition in the AI space.
  • OpenAI has implemented a new training technique called deliberative alignment to enhance safety and reliability.
  • The models are currently not publicly available, but testing will be invited for external parties.
“We view this as the beginning of the next phase of AI,” - Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI.
“o3 blew it out of the water,” - Ofir Press, Princeton University.

This breakthrough marks a significant advance in AI technology, with both OpenAI and Google striving for leadership in the field.

item.title: OpenAI announces new o3 models - TechCrunch
item.description:
OpenAI announces new o3 models

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: TechCrunch

OpenAI has introduced its new o3 models as part of its 12-day 'shipmas' event, marking a significant advancement in AI reasoning technology.

  • The o3 model family includes o3 and o3-mini, a smaller variant tailored for specific tasks.
  • OpenAI claims that o3 can approach artificial general intelligence (AGI) under certain conditions.
  • The launch of o3 and o3-mini is aimed at improving safety in AI model interactions.
  • OpenAI has modified its reasoning process to become more reliable, with enhanced self-verification capabilities.
  • Future previews for o3 are expected, but availability is limited as testing continues.
“o3, our latest reasoning model, is a breakthrough, with a step function improvement on our hardest benchmarks.” — Greg Brockman, OpenAI

The release of o3 signals OpenAI's commitment to advancing safe AI technologies, even as competition in the reasoning model sector increases.

item.title: It's already Christmas in GTA Online: access new bonuses and gifts - Softonic EN
item.description:
It's already Christmas in GTA Online: access new bonuses and gifts

Publication Date: December 20, 2024

Source: Softonic

Christmas has arrived in Los Santos, bringing with it a series of festive activities and bonuses for players in GTA Online. Classic events like the Yeti Hunt return, offering players to indulge in holiday-themed missions and rewards.

  • Classic events such as Yeti Hunt and Gooch appear in this year’s festive update.
  • Rewards include special outfits for completing certain challenges, such as the Yeti outfit and the Gooch outfit.
  • New vehicles and double rewards for various missions are available during the holiday update.
  • GTA+ members receive exclusive offers and gifts including the Bravado Banshee GTS and festive clothing.
  • A range of free festive gifts, including themed outfits and special in-game currency, is accessible for players.
“Once again, Christmas arrives during these special dates to remind us of the importance of love, family, and festive mischief.”

The holiday season in GTA Online brings new gameplay experiences and rewards, encouraging players to engage with festive events both for fun and community spirit.

item.title: The MacBook Pro with M4 is matching its record low with $200 off - The Verge
item.description:
MacBook Pro with M4 is Matching its Record Low with $200 Off

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: The Verge

Recently, the base model of the MacBook Pro with M4 has dropped in price, making it a competitive choice for both professionals and everyday users.

  • The MacBook Pro with M4 is now priced at $1,399, which is $200 off its regular price.
  • This model features a 10-core M4 chipset, which offers a significant speed advantage over the previous M3 model.
  • It comes standard with 16GB of RAM and 512GB SSD, doubling the RAM offered by predecessors.
  • The laptop has a third Thunderbolt 4 port and an upgraded 1080p webcam.
  • Suitable for tasks beyond average workloads, including heavier applications.
Apple claims its CPU has the strongest single-threaded performance of anything out there.

This exceptional pricing highlights the value of the M4 MacBook Pro, making it an attractive option for a wide variety of users.

item.title: Apple Maps Finally Has A Street View-Like Feature For These Users - News18
item.description:
Apple Maps Finally Has A Street View-Like Feature For These Users

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: News18

Apple Maps is enhancing its user experience with the new 'Look Around' feature, enabling 360-degree views similar to Google Street View to help users explore their surroundings more interactively.

  • The 'Look Around' feature is currently rolling out online and has been available on iOS since version 13.
  • It was first made accessible in select cities in the U.S., Canada, Australia, and the EU.
  • Users can activate Look Around by clicking on the binoculars icon on the Maps web app.
  • Apple plans to expand this feature further and add additional functionalities in the future.
“The feature was introduced on December 11 and is being progressively expanded to include more areas.”

This new feature aims to improve Apple Maps' competitiveness against Google Maps, particularly in regions like India where Apple Maps has less market share.

item.title: The AI war between Google and OpenAI has never been more heated - Ars Technica
item.description:
The AI War: Google vs. OpenAI Heats Up

Publication Date: December 2023 Source: Tech News

In recent weeks, Google and OpenAI have ramped up their AI advancements, intensifying competition between the two tech giants. The rapid release of new products has overwhelmed the AI community.

  • OpenAI has initiated a campaign called "12 Days of OpenAI," showcasing various product launches.
  • Google has responded with a flurry of its own releases, leading to a fierce rivalry.
  • Comments on social media highlight the overwhelming nature of these updates.
  • The competition is noted to be occurring close to the Christmas holiday, adding urgency to the announcements.
"12 Days of OpenAI has turned into like 50 new @GoogleAI releases," - X user

This competitive landscape suggests significant developments in the AI domain, warranting attention from both industry insiders and the public.
